assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Nippon Seiki Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells instruments for automobiles, motorcycles, agricultural and construction machines, and marine in Japan and internationally. The company also provides head-up displays; level, revolution, angle, stroke, inertial, and versatile ultrasonic velocity sensors; and EMS with high-density PCB mounting for automobiles, as well as aftermarket products, such as link meters and multi-digital displays under the Defi brand. In addition, it offers household appliances, including remote controllers for water heater and packaged air conditioners, as well as central controllers; office automation equipment office automation operation panels for multi-functional printer; and factory automation equipment. Further, the company provides controllers for air-conditioning and residential equipment; and car inspection and repair, and rental services, as well as sells new and used automobiles. Additionally, it processes and sells resin materials; manufactures building and household control circuits, assemble harnesses for in-vehicle instruments, and fuel gauge sender units; and offers logistics, import/ export customs clearance, food delivery, insurance agency, and advertising agency services, as well as information systems and services. Nippon Seiki Co., Ltd. was founded in 1946 and is headquartered in Nagaoka, Japan.
